_isEnabled.title: Enable assessment set
_isEnabled.description: Determines whether this article is an assessment

_id.title: Assessment ID
_id.description: Unique ID for this set. Referenced by other plugins when using the Scoring API

title.title: Title
title.description: A title for this set. Not required, but exposed should it be used for reporting purposes

_isScoreIncluded.title: Include in overall score
_isScoreIncluded.description: Determines whether the set should be included in the overall score via the Scoring API

_isCompletionRequired.title: Required for score completion
_isCompletionRequired.description: Determines whether the set should be completed for Scoring API completion

_reset.title: Reset
_reset.description: The settings used to configure resetting this assessment

_scrollTo.title: Scroll to assessment
_scrollTo.description: Determines whether to scroll to this assessment when reset

_questionsType.title: Questions reset type
_questionsType.description: Determines whether the questions will remain completed when reset. A 'soft' reset allows questions to be retaken, but the complete attribute remains set to true. A 'hard' reset requires the question to be completed again. For 'soft', when using trickle, please set the trickle Completion Attribute to '_isInteractionComplete'

_presentationComponentsType.title: Presentation components reset type
_presentationComponentsType.description: Determines whether the presentation components will remain completed when reset. A 'hard' reset requires the question to be completed again. For 'soft', when using trickle, please set the trickle Completion Attribute to '_isInteractionComplete'

_failed.title: Failed
_failed.description: The reset settings to apply for a failed assessment

_canReset.title: Can the assessment be reset
_canReset.description: Determines whether the assessment can be reset

_isResetOnRevisit.title: Reset state on revisit
_isResetOnRevisit.description: Determines whether the assessment resets automatically (up to the number of available attempts) when a user revisits the page

_passed.title: Passed
_passed.description: The reset settings to apply for a passed assessment

_canReset.title: Can the assessment be reset
_canReset.description: Determines whether the assessment can be reset

_isResetOnRevisit.title: Reset state on revisit
_isResetOnRevisit.description: Determines whether the assessment resets automatically (up to the number of available attempts) when a user revisits the page

_passmark.title: Passmark
_passmark.description: The settings used to configure the assessment passmark

_isEnabled.title: Enable passmark
_isEnabled.description: Determines whether a passmark is required

_score.title: Score
_score.description: Determines the score required to pass

_correctness.title: Correctness
_correctness.description: Determines the correctness (number of correctly answered questions) required to pass

_isScaled.title: Set passmark as percentage
_isScaled.description: Determines whether `_score` and `_correctness` are to be used as raw or percentage values

_attempts.title: Attempts
_attempts.description: The settings used to configure the assessment attempts

_limit.title: Allowed attempts
_limit.description: Determines the number of attempts the user is allowed to complete this assessment. Set to -1 (or 0) to allow infinite attempts

_shouldStoreAttempts.title: Retain attempt history
_shouldStoreAttempts.description: Determines whether the history of all attempts is retained across browser sessions. Requires a suitable tracking plugin to be used

_questions.title: Questions
_questions.description: The settings used to configure the assessment questions

_canShowFeedback.title: Enable feedback
_canShowFeedback.description: Allows the user to view feedback on their answer

_canShowMarking.title: Enable marking
_canShowMarking.description: Displays ticks and crosses on question completion

_canShowModelAnswer.title: Enable correct answer toggle
_canShowModelAnswer.description: Allows the user to view the 'model answer' should they answer the question incorrectly

_suppressMarking.title: Suppress marking until complete
_suppressMarking.description: Determines whether question marking should be delayed until completion of the assessment or until all attempts have been exhausted
